PackageOracle.name: DA_SYS_PRIN_EXCLUSION
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SYS_PRIN_EXCLUSION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.312600000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,agent IN NUMBER
,effective_dt IN DATE
,exclusion_desc IN VARCHAR2
,principal IN NUMBER
,system IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,system IN NUMBER
,principal IN NUMBER
,agent IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_sys_prin_exclusion;

body.name: DA_SYS_PRIN_EXCLUSION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SYS_PRIN_EXCLUSION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.21.323530000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,agent IN NUMBER
,effective_dt IN DATE
,exclusion_desc IN VARCHAR2
,principal IN NUMBER
,system IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sys_prin_exclusion.add, parms=' || agent || '|' || effective_dt || '|' || exclusion_desc || '|' || principal || '|' || system || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_sys_prin_exclusion a
(
a.agent
,a.effective_dt
,a.exclusion_desc
,a.principal
,a.system
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.agent
,add.effective_dt
,add.exclusion_desc
,add.principal
,add.system
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sys_prin_exclusion.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,system IN NUMBER
,principal IN NUMBER
,agent IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_sys_prin_exclusion.del, parms=' || system || '|' || principal || '|' || agent || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_sys_prin_exclusion a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.system = del.system
AND a.principal = del.principal
AND a.agent = del.agent
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_sys_prin_exclusion.del');

END del;

END da_sys_prin_exclusion;
